title.value: Query Form to find manufactured items

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution

dql_value.value: select item_code, item_type, item_name, applicable_sites, product_code from cd_manuf_item_info where (item_code is nullstring or item_code like '%$value(item_code)%') and (item_type is nullstring or item_type like '%$value(item_type)%') and (item_name is nullstring or item_name like '%$value(item_name)%') and ('$value(product_code) ' = ' ' or product_code = '$value(product_code)') and ('$value(applicable_sites) ' = ' ' or any applicable_sites in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites))) order by 1
